docs.title: Mission
docs.text: This resource hub is a curated collection of climate science resources, tools, and opportunities. Our mission is to make climate science accessible to everyone.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Clean & organized resources
  • Simple, fast static site
  • Open source
  • Easy to contribute

docs.title: Contribute
docs.text:
1. Submit new resources via GitHub pull request
  2. Report broken links or outdated information
  3. Suggest improvements
  4. Share with your community

docs.title: Resource Categories
docs.text:
• Education - Courses, training, learning
  • Research - Data, reports, organizations
  • Data & Tools - Datasets, APIs, tools
  • Careers - Jobs, fellowships
  • Investment - Funds, financing

docs.title: Technical Stack
docs.text:
• Framework: Jekyll
